captions.text: It would be better if we were dating
and I could hold your hand.
I'll just be home in my sweatpants,

stalking you on every
form of social media.
- I think I'm gonna go hiking.
Who's this girl you're hiking with?

What does she, like, do
yoga in her spare time?
- No, I'm gonna go with Eugene.

I actually hate hiking,
but if you wanna go hiking
with me, I would hike up Mount Everest.
- Oh, really? We should all go sometime.

Holy shit, what does this
mean? Do you like me?

Does this mean I should start
a wedding Pinterest board?
- I know this epic trail in Santa Monica.

But what if we start
dating and we find out
we don't have the same taste in movies,

and then we don't have
anything to watch on Netflix?
You know what? I don't care!

I don't care because I
like you and I can't wait

to make this Facebook
official so that I can
rub it in everyone else's faces. I can't--

title: What You Say To Your Crush Vs. What You're Thinking
